longBusinessSummary: Robinsons Retail Holdings, Inc. operates as a multi-format retail company in the Philippines. It operates supermarkets under the Robinsons Supermarket brand that offer health and wellness, and fresh food products; and department stores under the Robinsons Department Store brand, which provide men's, ladies', and children's apparel, as well as shoes, bags, luggage, accessories, sportswear, furnishings, toys, snacks, and stationery. The company also operates do-it-yourself (DIY) stores under the Handyman Do it Best, True Value, True Home, Robinsons Builders, Home Plus, and A.M. Builders' Depot brands that offer DIY and home improvement products; operates and franchises convenience stores under the Ministop name that provide fresh and ready to eat products; and operates drug stores under the South Star Drug name that offer prescription and over-the-counter pharmaceutical products, as well as food, personal care, and other products. In addition, it operates consumer electronics and appliances stores under Robinsons Appliances and Saver's Appliance Depot name; fashion retail stores under the Topshop, Topman, Dorothy Perkins, Warehouse, and Burton Menswear London brands; beauty products under the Benefit, Shiseido, Club Clio, and Elizabeth Arden brands; mass merchandise stores under Daiso Japan, Arcova, and Super50 name; nail care, cosmetics, and healthy slush under Chic Centre Corporation name; pet retail under Pet Lovers Centre name; discount store under No Brand name; and toys and juvenile products under Toys ÂR' Us name. As of December 31, 2019, it had 1,938 stores, including 265 supermarkets, 49 department stores, 222 DIY stores, 507 convenience stores, 376 drug stores, and 376 specialty stores. The company was formerly known as Robinsons Holdings, Inc. Robinsons Retail Holdings, Inc. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Pasig City, the Philippines.
address2: 43rd Floor Ortigas Center ADB Avenue corner Poveda Street
